title: Perform Propellant Loading
description: At the launch pad, a team must safely load highly volatile propellants (e.g., liquid hydrogen, liquid oxygen) into a rocket.

tasks.description: Verify that all personnel are clear of the hazardous zone around the launch pad.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the area is clear.

tasks.description: Follow the detailed checklist to operate the valves and pumps of the propellant loading system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the procedure precisely to avoid any safety incidents.

tasks.description: Monitor the temperature, pressure, and fluid levels in the rocket's tanks to ensure the propellant is loaded to the correct levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent monitors the system and confirms the tanks are filled to the target amounts.
